item.description:
Topics for this month will include:

-Debrief and feedback from the BlogHer Boston '08
Conference

-Upcoming events such as National Blog Posting Month, DonorsChoose.org Blogger Challenge for Education, Schmolitics

-Organizing a community blog for the meetup

-The General Talikng/Interacting/Sharing

Something a little different this month (in addition to moving the date to October 21st):

There is a fee of $2.00 per person this month to defray the cost of renting the space. You may pay online through the meetup site or pay in person when you arrive.


Looking forward to seeing you there!
item.how_to_find_us: There will be a Meetup sign visible-I will also be on hand to greet

group.name: The Greater Boston Area Weblogger Meetup Group

item.name: October Meetup
